outline:
1. indeed, surely (emphatic)
  2. howbeit, only, but, yet (restrictive)
kjv_def: also, in any wise, at least, but, certainly, even, howbeit, nevertheless, notwithstanding, only, save, surely, of a surety, truly, verily, [phrase] wherefore, yet (but).
strongs_def: a particle of affirmation, surely; hence (by limitation) only
